terms.value: Pause
Resume
START
SETTINGS
QUIT
Vitaliy
Hello, how are you?
Grandfather
Fine!
Get well soon!
Fine
Bad
Bucks
Shirt
Bayonet
Damn... My head is splitting. It's been a while since I felt this bad.
Oh, our prince-alcohol has woken up! I thought I'd have to carry you out to the cemetery.
Thanks, nanny. Your moonshine is what finished me off.
Moonshine? This isn't a restaurant to serve champagne.
Well, get out into the fresh air, you need to unwind.
*heavy sigh*
Yeah, I could use a pick-me-up.
Your left.. My legs are like cotton wool, as if a tram ran over me (I think I should use WASD?)
Heh, it's a little wobbly, but I can get to the meadow.
My neck seems a little jammed. (You can look around with the mouse)
Lovely.
It hasn't even been a year!
You try it with my hangover...
Start training already. I'll be watching, or you'll kill yourself with a hangover.
Hmm, where's my club? (I seem to remember that you can take weapons with F)
There's a scarecrow over there, it's kind of crooked, straighten it out with your club
Well... You remembered how to scare enemies with a club, now let's get down to real business.
Play with the gun, there are a couple more scarecrows left.
Now-now, I'll shoot them in no time (The shot, however, is on the left mouse button)
Hello, you do shoot. Obviously, better than you drink.
Guys, listen! There's a thread here. In short, I've received information that things are worse for Gr1 than ever. Their chieftain is in debt, half the gang has fled.
So what? What's in it for us?
And that! Remember how fertile their territory is! Contraband is constantly coming in from abroad. And now it's guarded by three pimply teenagers.
What are you babbling about? Blind Yashka used to have people with machine guns terrorizing everyone and everything.
Well, that was before! But now everything has turned upside down. Now it's high time we showed up for this party of life, we'll hit them now - and the profits will flow like a river.
Hah, you're a sucker for money. What if it's a trap? I can't believe it's all that simple.
Really, Bayonet, you guarantee there's no ambush there?
No deal, guys, here's Yashka's receipt to the local moneylender.
He even pawned his hat, damn it. It looks like everything is too sad for him.
Okay, guys, stop wagging your tongues. Let's gather the lads.
